title: Therapy log
description: Each entry describes theraputic action taken or to be taken over a period of time.

calendar_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date when therapy was received or when plan was established.

timestamp.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time when therapy was received or when plan was established

location_id.description: location where therapy was received or will be carried out.

person_id.description: the person to who underwent or will undergo the therapy treatment.

body_site_code.description: This enumeration includes all codes from FHIR's body-site definition http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/body-site.

diagnosis_id.description: Reference to the diagnosis requiring the therapy treatment.

therapy_name.description: A textual name of the therapy e.g. massage.

therapy_sctid.description: SNOWMED CT ID referencing a procedure. See https://www.hl7.org/fhir/valueset-procedure-code.html

timing.description: when the therapy should take place
